doc.name: InteractiveDialog
doc.description: This actor creates a window on the screen with a command entry box and a results display box. When the user types a command and terminates it with a return, this actor will emit an output with the value of that command and also display the command in the results display box. Any input that it receives it displays in the results display box.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.port: The input port. By default, this has undeclared type. If backward type inference is enabled, then it has type general. In either case, it can receive any data type. If it receives token of type string, it strips off the surrounding double quotes before displaying the value.
doc.property: If true, append a newline to each output string. This is a boolean that defaults to false.
